overview: Journey to modern-day Turkey with an American-Armenian granddaughter of genocide survivors in search of long-buried truths and a forbidden past that has been awaiting discovery for more than a century. A chance encounter with a Scottish explorer leads to a joint odyssey unearthing sacred relics, silenced voices, daring resilience and the hidden map.
tagline: Journey to Turkey with an American-Armenian woman in search of a forbidden past.
title: The Hidden Map
